dict.string: AB
Do the exact same ab workout in the AM as John Bossi.
BT
Remove underwear while seated on the Headwall lift, and succeed in tossing it onto the Bra Tree.
CB
Cook breakfast with a camping stove in the KT line on a powder day. Must go first chair.
EB
At Extreme Benches, brag to at least 5 people about how rad you got today.
FK
First KT Chair on a powder day.
FKF
First KT Chair on a powder day & do Nose to Fingers.
FL
Froot Boot through the terrain park hitting all the jumps, wearing only women's lingerie top and panties for three runs.
GT
Ask any stranger which player in your group has the darkest, most defined goggle tan. Winner gets points.
HW
Order a Thai wrap from the Headwall Cafe.
KHG
First Chair on KT, Headwall, Granite Chief all on one pawder day.
NM
Give Jeff McKitterick a phat nug.
PP
Get the pole position space in the parking lot. Directly accross from Plum Jacks and closest to Tram Bldg. No Handicap spots.
PC
To any pro, yell, "Hey (name), I can't believe you're a pro. I'm totally better than you!"
SR
Ride the Granie Chief List with George Theohold. George is a commonly spotted Squallywood local who starred as slasher in Hot Dog, The Movie.
SS

Ride the Granie Chief List with George Theohold. George is a commonly spotted Squallywood local who starred as slasher in Hot Dog, The Movie. Headwall Express with Surfer Steve. Steve is a diehard local who you won't be able to keep up with.
TB
Give out at least 5 Red Bulls in the KT line before the lift opens. If sponsored by Red Bull, must also give out $2 with each can.
TA
Get the Tram Operator to announce to a full tram load, "And also today (your name) gets 2,000 GNAR extra credit points." Only one player per tram ride.
